oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Asymptotics of Sample Entropy Production Rate for Stochastic Differential Equations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wang, Feng-Yu
Xiong, Jie
Xu, Lihu
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Probability
Mathematical Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: By using the dimension-free Harnack inequality and the integration by parts formula for the associated diffusion semigroup, we prove the central limit theorem, the moderate deviation principle, and the logarithmic iteration law for the sample entropy production rate of stochastic differential equations with Lipschitz continuous and dissipative drifts.
